pkgmetadata.longdescription: Valence Aware Dictionary and sEntiment Reasoner (VADER) // A lexicon and rule-based sentiment analysis tool that is specifically attuned to sentiments expressed in social media, and works well on texts from other domains. Hutto Gilbert (2014) (https://www.aaai.org/ocs/index.php/ICWSM/ICWSM14/paper/ view/8109/8122).
